attributes.action: Stop judges giving lenient sentences to paedophiles and repeat offenders.
attributes.additional_details: the news and media shows paedophiles having very lenient sentences that don’t match the heinous crimes. A child’s life is ruined forever and yet the predator is free to hurt again and do repeatedly. Judges are passing sentences that the public are appalled and disgusted with. We want the Government to make sure that these judges pass longer and tougher sentences with chemical castration and a guarantee that this Government is doing all it can to save our children and future generations
attributes.background: Paedophiles get lenient sentences and judges give community service or rehabilitation that fails! Longer prison terms for possession of illicit photos and child porn and chemical castration for repeat offenders. Judges who often give lenient sentences that don’t fit the crime to step down from cases

rejection.details:
We think that this petition is similar: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323338

Anyone can ask the Attorney General to review a sentence they think is too low if the crime was tried in a Crown Court. Only one person needs to ask for a sentence to be reviewed. You can find out how to do that here:

https://www.gov.uk/complain-about-low-crown-court-sentence
